trans-unit.source: Contains transformation data that is accumulated when manipulation events occur.
trans-unit.target: Contém dados de transformação acumulados quando ocorrem eventos de manipulação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta> class contains information about the changes in the position of a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta> classe contém informações sobre as alterações na posição de uma manipulação.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] interprets the changes as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] interpreta as alterações como uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event occurs on a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, use the properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta> object to transform the object that should be manipulated.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> evento ocorre em um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, use as propriedades de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta> objeto para transformar o objeto que deve ser manipulado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs> class provides two properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta>: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs> classe fornece duas propriedades do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta>: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.DeltaManipulation%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs.CumulativeManipulation%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre manipulações, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um aplicativo que responde às manipulações, consulte [passo a passo: Criando seu primeiro toque aplicativo](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> evento.

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> properties to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo aplica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> propriedades para mover, redimensionar e girar um <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior no [passo a passo: Criando seu primeiro toque aplicativo](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O movimento linear da manipulação em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: A rotação da manipulação em graus.

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de redimensionamento de uma manipulação como um multiplicador.

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de manipulação foi redimensionada em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade de redimensionamento da manipulação em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de manipulação foi redimensionada em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> properties both report a resizing manipulation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> ambas as propriedades de relatório uma manipulação de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported.
trans-unit.target: A diferença entre os dois é a maneira na qual o valor é relatado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> propriedade relata a manipulação de redimensionamento de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> property reports the value as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> propriedade informa o valor como um multiplicador.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> é 0,5, a manipulação é interpretada como reduzir o tamanho em 50%.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> for 2, a manipulação é interpretada como aumentar o tamanho em 100%.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a rotação da manipulação em graus.

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the manipulation in degrees.
trans-unit.target: A rotação da manipulação em graus.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as rotating around an axis.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> propriedade relatórios da maneira que uma manipulação é interpretada como rotação ao redor de um eixo.

trans-unit.source: The axis is usually the point between the two points of contact that initiated the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: O eixo é geralmente o ponto entre os dois pontos de contato que iniciou a manipulação.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> evento.

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> properties to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo aplica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> propriedades para mover, redimensionar e girar um <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior no [passo a passo: Criando seu primeiro toque aplicativo](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount the manipulation has resized as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor que a manipulação redimensionou como um multiplicador.

trans-unit.source: The amount the manipulation has resized.
trans-unit.target: O valor da manipulação foi redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> properties both report a resizing manipulation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> ambas as propriedades de relatório uma manipulação de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two is the way in which the value is reported.
trans-unit.target: A diferença entre os dois é a maneira na qual o valor é relatado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> property reports the value as a multiplier.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> propriedade informa o valor como um multiplicador.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 0.5, the manipulation is interpreted as decreasing the size by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> é 0,5, a manipulação é interpretada como reduzir o tamanho em 50%.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> is 2, the manipulation is interpreted as increasing the size by 100 percent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A> for 2, a manipulação é interpretada como aumentar o tamanho em 100%.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> property reports the resizing manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Expansion%2A> propriedade relata a manipulação de redimensionamento de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> evento.

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> properties to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo aplica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> propriedades para mover, redimensionar e girar um <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior no [passo a passo: Criando seu primeiro toque aplicativo](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the linear motion of the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o movimento linear da manipulação.

trans-unit.source: The linear motion of the manipulation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O movimento linear da manipulação em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A> property reports the way a manipulation is interpreted as moving horizontally and vertically on the screen.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A> propriedade relatórios da maneira que uma manipulação é interpretada como mover horizontalmente e verticalmente na tela.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationDelta> evento.

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> properties to move, resize, and rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo aplica o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Translation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Scale%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDelta.Rotation%2A> propriedades para mover, redimensionar e girar um <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior no [passo a passo: Criando seu primeiro toque aplicativo](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
